eventName: Post Degree Diploma at Langara College
eventDetails: After I worked as a DevOps engineer for almost 1 year, I left my job to pursue my career in web and mobile application program at Langara College.
I have worked as a full-time consultant for giving support to the production servers at the biggest telecommunication company which is Turk Telekom.

I got selected top 1000 developers who got a scholarship funded by Google during a coding challenge that was presented by Udacity. The scholarship contained courses that take 6 months to complete. I learnt the Progressive Web application pattern and created a web application by applying this knowledge that I learnt from this course.
I studied at the International Language of Canada for IELTS preparation and explored Canada.
After I graduated, I got selected the top 7 new graduate students in the Bootcamp event in 2017. And was invited to a Bootcamp which takes 2 months.
I developed applications with Java, PHP, C#. Attented enterprenuership camp and pitch my own idea

eventName: Lead Software Developer at Startup company
eventDetails: I have worked as a lead developer for 7 months in a startup company that is in early-stage at the incubator center on our university campus.
Developed an ERP software engineer for Help Desk assistant for the company.
